mapper.select: SELECT b.board_id, b.title, b.content, b.views, b.notification_flag, b.created_at, a.name AS writer FROM board b JOIN admin a ON b.admin_id = a.account_id WHERE b.notification_flag = 1 ORDER BY b.created_at DESC LIMIT 5
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board( title, content, notification_flag, category_id, type, admin_id ) VALUES ( #{title}, #{content}, #{notificationFlag}, #{categoryId}, #{type}, #{adminId} )
mapper.select: SELECT title, content, notification_flag, category_id FROM board WHERE board_id = #{boardId}
